question.xref: DES s19, HC r98, HC p40
question.text: You’re towing a small trailer on a busy three-lane motorway. All the lanes are open. You must

explanation.text:
The motorway regulations for towing a trailer state that you MUST NOT
• use the right-hand lane of a three-lane motorway, unless directed to do so (for example, at roadworks or due to a lane closure)
• exceed 60 mph.

answer.text: use only the left and centre lanes
